keys: velocidad de la extensión del campo

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Polje se ne razsširi v trenutku</string>
            <string language="en">The field does NOT propagate instantaneously</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">auffangene pflanzt NICHT blitzschnell fort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La zone ne propage pas instantanément</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O campo não propaga instantaneamente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il campo non si propaga istantaneamente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πεδίο δεν διαδίδει στιγμιαία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El campo no propaga instantáneamente</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Spremembe oblike električnega polja pri premikanju električnega naboja in hitrost spreminjanja.</string>
            <string language="en">Changes in shape of electric field when moving charge and speed of propagation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električno polje</string>
            <string language="en">electric field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">hitrost širjenja polja</string>
            <string language="en">field expansion velocity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektrika</string>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ändert in der Form von elektrischem 
auffangen wann bewegliche Ladung und Geschwindigkeit der 
Ausbreitung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Change dans la forme du champ électrique quand 
charge et vitesse mobiles de la propagation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudar na forma do campo elétrico quando carga e 
velocidade moventes da propagação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambia nella figura del campo elettrico quando 
carica e velocità commoventi della propagazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλαγές στη μορφή του ηλεκτρικού πεδίου όταν χρεώνει
η κίνηση και ταχύτητα της διάδοσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambia en dimensión de una variable del campo 
eléctrico cuando carga y velocidad móviles de la propagación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fangen Sie Expansion Geschwindigkeit auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrizität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vitesse d'expansion de zone</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
